item.title: Migrating Glovo’s dispatching service from a single machine to a distributed system
item.description: At Glovo, we have one vision: Connecting our customers to their cities. We do that by facilitating access to different services (like restaurants, supermarkets, and other stores) through a single mobile application and a fleet of independent couriers. Anything you want. Delivered in minutes. Of course, that is easier said than done. Behind the scenes, there are hundreds of factors that affect the experience of our customers and couriers.
